data.eml:eml: A new species of Monstrilla (Copepoda, Monstrilloida) from the plankton of a large coastal system of the northwestern Caribbean with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Suarez-Morales, Eduardo, Castellanos-Osorio, Ivan A. (2019): A new species of Monstrilla (Copepoda, Monstrilloida) from the plankton of a large coastal system of the northwestern Caribbean with a key to species. ZooKeys 876: 111-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.876.38400, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.876.38400
